Sentencas: The Mn-doped titanate can lead to the remarkable chemical adsorption of CO2 uncovering the tremendous potential for direct high temperature CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Efficient Carbon Dioxide Electrolysis Based on Perovskite Cathode Enhanced with Nickel Nanocatalyst

Sentencas: Unfortunately, the application of this material is still limited by insufficient carbon dioxide splitting and electrocatalytic activity.
Titulo: Efficient Carbon Dioxide Electrolysis Based on Perovskite Cathode Enhanced with Nickel Nanocatalyst

Sentencas: This study reports the improved electrocatalytic activity and Faraday efficiency of composite cathode with exsolution of nickel nanocrystals on the surface of doped titanate for CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Efficient Carbon Dioxide Electrolysis Based on Perovskite Cathode Enhanced with Nickel Nanocatalyst

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity has been enhanced in the presence of metallic Ni in contrast to bare Mn doped titanate and further correlated to the electrochemical performance of the composite cathodes.
Titulo: Efficient Carbon Dioxide Electrolysis Based on Perovskite Cathode Enhanced with Nickel Nanocatalyst

Sentencas: Promising electrode polarization has been demonstrated based on the titanate with nickel nanoparticles and the Faraday efficiency is improved for the direct CO2 electrolysis at high temperatures.
Titulo: Efficient Carbon Dioxide Electrolysis Based on Perovskite Cathode Enhanced with Nickel Nanocatalyst
